Test Framework External Defintions
Test Framework API

The section has a list of all external definitions which are exposed by the module. More...

Macros

#define TEST_FMK_CMD_GET_ADCBUF_HANDLE   1
 This is the command which can be used by the application or profile developers to get the ADCBUF driver handle from the core module. arg = &ADCBuf_Handle argLen = sizeof (ADCBuf_Handle)
 
#define TEST_FMK_CMD_GET_EDMA_HANDLE   2
 This is the command which can be used by the application or profile developers to get the EDMA driver handle from the core module. arg = &EDMA_Handle[NUM_CC] argLen = sizeof (EDMA_Handle) More...
 
#define TEST_FMK_CMD_GET_CONFIG   3
 This is the command which can be used by the application or profile developers to get the configuration. arg = &TestFmk_Cfg argLen = sizeof (TestFmk_Cfg)
 
#define TEST_FMK_CMD_SET_CONFIG   4
 This is the command which can be used by the application to set the configuration which will be used across the Test Framework Instances. arg = &TestFmk_Cfg argLen = sizeof (TestFmk_Cfg) More...
 
#define TEST_FMK_CMD_NOTIFY_FAULT   5
 This is the command which can be used by the application to inform the module that there was a CPU/ESM fault reported by the mmWave link layer. This is passed to the profile to take appropriate action. arg = NULL argLen = 0.
 
#define TEST_FMK_CMD_PROFILE_START_INDEX   100
 Profile specific command start index: Command Index before this are reserved for use by the core Module. All profiles should use this as a starting index for their own custom commmands.
 

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all external definitions which are exposed by the module.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define TEST_FMK_CMD_GET_EDMA_HANDLE   2

This is the command which can be used by the application or profile developers to get the EDMA driver handle from the core module. arg = &EDMA_Handle[NUM_CC] argLen = sizeof (EDMA_Handle)

NOTE: The number of EDMA instances is different between the MSS & DSS. Please refer to the definition in the sys_common.h and pass the correct size.

#define TEST_FMK_CMD_SET_CONFIG   4

This is the command which can be used by the application to set the configuration which will be used across the Test Framework Instances. arg = &TestFmk_Cfg argLen = sizeof (TestFmk_Cfg)

NOTE: This should be the last configuration command issued to the profile. Any profile specific configuration should be done before using this "command".
